name: Herald of the Void
description: The Herald of the Void is a powerful and imposing Large Fiend with a reputation for both chaos and cerebral might. It features an ethereal form that allows it to hover and fly with elegance, wielding chilling cold and force magic with deadly precision.
memorable: The Herald's ability to vaporize objects upon contact and create a cone of psychic energy makes it a truly unique threat.
goals: To instill chaos and destruction, serving as an avatar of the Void.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other fiends or chaotic entities.
environment: Commonly found in dark realms or chaotic planes.
strengths: Immunities to cold, necrotic, and radiant damage, along with a high Dexterity and Constitution, grant it exceptional defensive capabilities.
weaknesses: Relatively average Strength limits its physical melee attack potency, relying more on finesse and ranged options.
attacks: Utilizes Void Claw melee attacks and the powerful Void Ray, combining cold and force damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Final Song, unleashing a psychic cone attack that can devastate those unprepared for its cosmic melody.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 60 feet and has a passive Perception of 20, showcasing exceptional awareness.
skills: Excels in Perception and Stealth, making it difficult to detect and evade.
additional_information: Can vaporize objects that touch it
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws
Zero-Dimensional ability enables movement through any space without squeezing
Can provide temporary hit points to allies that understand Void Speech
Immunity to various conditions adds to its formidable nature
test_queries: cold damage fiend with superb evasion
intangible large fiend with deadly claws
